QuestData.Title: Amber Is Life
QuestData.Description: In order for our efforts against the mantid empire to continue, we require more amber.$B$BThere is a great deposit of amber underneath the lake to the south, but the area is inhabited by a savage saurok tribe.$B$BI cannot spare anyone else. You must go to the lake and test the tribe's strength. Thin their numbers and eliminate their leader, who is probably hiding in his underground cavern.$B$BSurely this is not too great a task for you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 7 Mistblade Rippers and the Mistblade Scale-Lord.
QuestData.RewardText: The whispers seem to be emanating from within this amber.$B$BCould there be another paragon sleeping within?
